extendedInfo.description: Please submit any bugs here - http://chameleonlauncher.com/support/bugs/ or contact support@chameleonlauncher.comChameleon Launcher is a Home Screen replacement. This version will run on both phones and tablet devices. It lets you create multiple home screens, each with your own layout of Widgets and Apps. The Chameleon app includes an innovative context based home screen system giving you the most relevant information you want - when you want it. The Next Generation of Widgets.Android widgets are not all created equally - and that's the problem - so we decided to raise the bar. The result is widgets that look beautiful together and are as easy to layout as drawing on a screen. Take a look at some of our other widgets or build your own with our custom API.-Calendar-Clock-Facebook-Google+-Instagram-Media Player (Coming soon!)-RSS News Reader-Switches-Twitter-YouTubeHome Screens that Change With YouYour information needs change throughout your day, so Cwe have included an innovative context system. You can create context rules based on GPS locations, WiFi networks and time ranges, allowing you to define which Home Screen is the most relevant for any situation.App Tray & LauncherChameleon doesn't just let you customize your Home Screens with the widgets you want. It also lets you customize your own mini App Tray. Giving you the apps you want up front, without having to swim through a large grid of apps.Super Easy To CustomizeQuickly set up Home Screens, Widgets, App Trays, and Wallpapers all with a few gestures.Chameleon. Always relevant. Immediately valuable.

reviews.title: Promising but buggy
reviews.comment: I like the concept, but the whole system is buggy and slow. Widgets sometimes take ages to load, even when they require no Internet content (like showing the time). Wallpaper adding is unnecessarily  complicated.  It has promise, but the bugs and speed will drive anyone away. I can\'t recommend this until those issues are sorted.
reviews.author: Bob Burgess

reviews.title: Needs work
reviews.comment: Needs more control over data refreshes and needs a bit more work on battery use. Uses about twice as much battery/cpu as stock or Nova launcher. The idea is great though. But can\'t really use it as it is. Would hope to see more updates than there have been thus far.
reviews.author: Brian Hollenbeck

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Works great on the Asus transformer prime. It runs very smooth and the features are awesome. It would be better if you could set your own wallpaper though, instead of just having the default ones.  Edit: I also tested it out on my Nexus 4 and liked it as well. The more I use it the more I like it. There is room for improvement though. Just one example is that when you switch from landscape to portrait mode (or vise versa) the widgets don\'t flip the way one would expect. Keep up the good work though.
reviews.author: Alex Gigliotti

reviews.title: Great on tablet...problems on phone.
reviews.comment: Works great on my Nexus 7 but has some of issues on Galaxy S3. It sometimes goes to a black screen before regenerating my homescreen. Please address asap. Great work with the tablet version tho.
reviews.author: Kayode Quashie

reviews.title: Money back please
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work as intended.  Widgets take ages to refesh. Not enough widgets. Dock needs to be customizible. Doesn\'t work properly on asus tf101, asus padfone 2, galaxy s2 and galaxy note 2.  Good idea though.
reviews.author: Sarunas Bandinskas

reviews.title: Come on! Really?!
reviews.comment: I paid what $15 for this launcher 6-12 months ago. Nothing has changed. Great I can have my over priced beta launcher on my phone now. How about function and features. I can\'t even use my own background. Kind of upset with myself for purchasing this to begin with. You know you are doing something wrong when the app rating is 2.9 ... I put a lot of faith in this development team, never again.
reviews.author: Jeff Backus

reviews.title: Still buggy
reviews.comment: New update will not install on my nexus 7. The launcher is still very laggy when moving between screens. There is a lot of potential in this launcher however it needs work
reviews.author: Ken Thomas

reviews.title: Gutless!!!
reviews.comment: Gutless dev took all the money and ran away. They don\'t have the gut even to reply to our mails.
reviews.author: Manikandan R

reviews.title: Lots of potential
reviews.comment: I really like the idea of this launcher for tablets. It needs a bit of work though. There\'s a horrible lag when exiting an app before the home screen loads. There needs to be more widgets and you should be able to select which app launches when you tap a widget. More customization would be nice too. I\'m looking forward to future updates.
reviews.author: Joey Gauthier

reviews.comment: They provide updates for a few weeks then vanish
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Buggy Black Screen While Reloading Resource Heavy
reviews.comment: Sometimes wait forever for home screen to reload. Wifi always on yet constantly need to \"re - authentic\" Facebook & Google + when coming from \'sleep\' state. I like the widgets but even with the instructions, haven\'t figured out how to make my own.
reviews.author: Gregory Le Grand

reviews.title: Lackluster dev support
reviews.comment: The developers seem to have abandoned this app honestly if your looking for a quality launcher look elsewhere this launcher drains battery widgets can be slow or not work at all and on top of all that it takes a while to go from closing an app to the home screen
reviews.author: Justin Looney

reviews.title: Promising, but not quite there yet.
reviews.comment: After looking at the reviews, I thought I\'d give this app a shot and it really has some striking features out-of-the-box. From what I understand this is a refresh from version 1.0, and with that there are sure to be plenty of bugs and odd quirks - hopefully they will be solved soon.  There is an app icon called Feedback, which lead me to believe that I could give bug reports or suggestions, but it turns out its just an automatic bug report collector.   Going back to stock launcher till it gets better.
reviews.author: Jonathan Almeida

reviews.title: Potential
reviews.comment: This app has the potential to be good! But if you listen to the comments & get information from the people who bought the app & what they want,  then you can figure out what\'s wrong... it would be nice to be able to customize the bottom of the launcher anyway we want, instead of it being the same all the time.
reviews.author: william aguilar

reviews.title: Problem on my Nexus 7
reviews.comment: Worked once on my Nexus 7, freezes everytime I try to load. Removed, I will try again when its updated
reviews.author: P Silvera

reviews.title: Good, certainly some issues.
reviews.comment: The main problem I have with this launcher is the lack of customization available for the widgets themselves. For example, the calendar widget won\'t let you select multiple calendars to display, and the \"event\" list (ie agenda view) displays an ugly black box at the top with the current date that is needless and can\'t be turned off.
reviews.author: Nathan Cox

reviews.title: Work in progress
reviews.comment: A great launcher, but slow to update information and also causes my devices to go to a black screen.
reviews.author: Eric Beattie

reviews.title: Love this
reviews.comment: Would of given it 5 but there are still some registering bugs and I would of liked it if there were more customisations. :)
reviews.author: john karafyllakis

reviews.title: Feels like its still in beta
reviews.comment: This app is very buggy and slows down a lot. I can get a free launcher with better performance than this one... Lack of widgets is frustrating and widgets freeze a lot when I try to configure it. If you decide to charge for your app please make sure that things are running smoothly, if not then just give it for free...
reviews.author: George Victor Gonzaga
